answer:
Yes. Your daughter can get vaccinated for free at your local health unit. You can find the contact information for your local health unit here.  We recommend that you call to make an appointment as soon as possible to prevent further delay with her immunizations. 
Immunization Nurse
question: My daughter was born in another country and became a resident of Canada. but msp is waiting period. She is two months. Can she get her first vaccination for free?
